mapper.select: SELECT budget_id, user_id, `year_month`, total_budget, asset_allocation, fixed_expenses, living_expense_budget, created_at, updated_at FROM budget WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND `year_month` = #{yearMonth}

SELECT ba.budget_allocation_id, ba.budget_id, ba.amount, a.asset_id AS a_asset_id, a.user_id AS a_user_id, a.asset_name AS a_asset_name, a.initial_amount AS a_initial_amount, a.current_amount AS a_current_amount, a.is_allocated AS a_is_allocated, a.created_at AS a_created_at, a.updated_at AS a_updated_at FROM budget_allocation ba JOIN asset a ON ba.asset_id = a.asset_id WHERE budget_id = #{budgetId}

SELECT fe.fixed_expense_id, fe.budget_id, fe.amount, c.category_id AS c_category_id, c.category_type AS c_category_type, c.category_name AS c_category_name, c.category_color AS c_category_color, c.created_at AS c_created_at FROM fixed_expenses fe JOIN category c ON fe.category_id = c.category_id WHERE budget_id = #{budgetId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO budget ( user_id, `year_month`, total_budget, asset_allocation, fixed_expenses, living_expense_budget, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{yearMonth}, #{totalBudget}, #{assetAllocation}, #{fixedExpenses}, #{livingExpenseBudget}, NOW(), NOW() )

INSERT INTO budget_allocation ( budget_id, asset_id, amount ) VALUES
(#{budgetId}, #{item.asset.assetId}, #{item.amount})

INSERT INTO fixed_expenses ( budget_id, category_id, amount ) VALUES
(#{budgetId}, #{item.category.categoryId}, #{item.amount})
mapper.update: UPDATE budget SET total_budget = #{totalBudget}, asset_allocation = #{assetAllocation}, fixed_expenses = #{fixedExpenses}, living_expense_budget = #{livingExpenseBudget}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE budget_id = #{budgetId}
